articles.title: Lincoln City boss issues update on Nottingham Forest loan star Brennan Johnson - Nottinghamshire Live
articles.description: The Reds are weighing up whether to recall the forward, who turned in another scintillating display for the Imps by scoring twice in the 5-1 victory over Burton Albion
articles.content:
Lincoln City are fairly confident Brennan Johnson will not be called back to Nottingham Forest next month.

articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti sets strong Everton platform to finally surpass Roberto Martinez - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Everton marked the one year anniversary of Carlo Ancelotti's first match in charge with a win at Sheffield United which illustrated just how far the Blues have come during the Italian's turbulent first twelve month in charge at Goodison Park
articles.content:
It's been a rollercoaster first year at Everton for a man even with the wealth of football experience Carlo Ancelotti can boast.

articles.title: Juventus 'refuse to sign Arsenal outcast Mesut Ozil for free in January' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Arsenal have been desperate to shed Mesut Ozil's £350,000-per-week wages amid the financial ramifications of the pandemic. Therefore, Arsenal have offered Ozil to several European clubs.
articles.content:
Juventus have turned down the opportunity to sign Arsenal outcast Mesut Ozil for free in January, according to reports.
